basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Regent Belva Prestidge Howard Scholarship

description: To provide scholarships for students pursuing a graduate degree in the School Counseling. Eligibility Requirements Open to any graduate student pursuing a degree in School Counseling Must be enrolled full-time (9 hours) Minimum 2.75 GPA Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
